description:
Caffeinated learning describes the buzz an adult learner experiences when a knowledgeable facilitator provides thoughtfully designed and skillfully conducted training. This course will provide you with the tools you need to conduct workshops that not only keep people awake, but also leave your participants with the knowledge and skills they need to be successful.

In eight units, Caffeinated Learning will guide you from initial meetings with clients, determining goals, choosing instructional methods, giving the instruction, and evaluating its effectiveness. Students will also learn about the special concerns involved with teaching adult learners, how to manage butterflies, and how to manage difficult participants. 

If you are new to teaching adults, this course is a great way to begin. If you've been teaching adults for years, you will learn new skills that will invigorate your teaching.
title: Caffeinated Learning
